__e: You're beginning to irritate me... and I don't like feelin' irritated!
For the 100th time, you had nothing to do with me getting involved in the Bumbry case, but for God's sake, the bigger problem facing us now is how do we get you to stop annoying me?
When you're not here, the things I know you're gonna do irritate me.
You might think I became a lawyer to piss him off, but you'd be wrong.
Kept working at the store for a few years as kids and just, you know, tried not to piss him off.
I never seen him, but I hear he's a man not to be trifled with.
At first, fucking him was... was just a way of yanking your chain.
I convinced mom to not celebrate Christmas once, just to piss you off.
Well, at least I know that nobody can annoy you as much as I do.
But darn it all, you've found someone who's willing to let you annoy them instead of me.
